overview: A huge number of migrants from Central Asia work in Moscow, including those who find time to play football. A special tournament "KG-League" was created for them. At first, he sought to unite the citizens of Kyrgyzstan, but now it has become truly international. Six heroes, five nations and one championship. Football Underground tells the story of the city's most unusual football tournament in the new documentary, Migrants' League.
title: Migrants League
